page.title: 03Safety devices in the home
page.content: When I was invited to Caroline's I found plenty of safety precautions for her baby. i saw that there was a guard on the fire which was very good for the baby because the room was very small. When Caroline suggested that we go upstairs I agreed and we got to the door and I noticed that at the top and the bottom of the stairs there was a safety guard, to stop Sally climbing up and down the stairs. She showed me into sally's room and inside was a cot with a safety lock on it which will stop Sally from dropping the side. The medicine was also out of reach. When I left I noticed a fence round the garden that would stip Sally getting out on to the road. Sally's Mum had a sterilizer to keep Sally's equipment clean so she doesn't get germs in her food.
